articles.title: Guns Kill More Kids and Teens in America Than Drugs or Cancer: Report - The Daily Beast
articles.description: A study by the New England Journal of Medicine found that more minors were killed by guns in America than any other cause in 2020.
articles.content: As of 2020, more Americans age 1 to 19 die by guns each year than any other causeincluding car accidents, drug overdoses, and cancer according to a study by The New England Journal of Medicine. The s… [+712 chars]
